TopicTitle: Proto Kerbol, The BEFORE Before Kerbin

Articles.Content: So when I first saw Before Kerbol I was amazed! But after a bit of jaw dropping, I wondered... What would the Kerbol system be like BEFORE then. Proto Kerbol will hopefully do such a thing. It will bring the Kerbol system to before Kerbol even started fusing Hydrogen into Helium. The Protostar phase, thus, Proto Kerbol. I will keep you updated on every detail. Thus, I must go and work. See you soon!
The kerbals have been around for such a long time O-O
